contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Newspaper | name = Juneau Empire | image = | caption = | type = Daily [[newspaper]] | format = [[Broadsheet]] | foundation = November 2, 1912 | ceased publication = | price =1.00 - 1.50 | owners = [[Morris Communications]] | publisher = Mark Bryan | editor = | language =English | circulation =Southeast Alaska | headquarters = 3100 Channel Drive<br>[[Juneau, Alaska|Juneau]], [[Alaska|AK]] 99801<br>[[United States]] | ISSN = | website = [http://juneauempire.com/ JuneauEmpire.com] }} The '''''Juneau Empire''''' is a [[newspaper]] in [[Juneau, Alaska|Juneau]], [[Alaska]], [[United States]]. It was founded on November 2, 1912 as the '''''Alaska Daily Empire'''''. In 1969 Morris Communications bought the newspaper.<ref>{{cite web| url=http://thomas.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/z?r112:S14NO2-0024:/ |title=RECOGNIZING THE JUNEAU EMPIRE CENTENNIAL |work=Congressional Record |date=November 14, 2012 |accessdate=February 1, 2013}}</ref> Mark Bryan was appointed publisher in 2009. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Portal|Alaska|Journalism}} * [http://www.juneauempire.com Official website] * [http://www.morris.com/divisions/morris_publishing_group/daily_newspapers/juneau.shtml Morris subsidiary profile of the ''Juneau Empire''] {{Morris newspapers}} {{coord|58|19|39|N|134|28|4|W |type:landmark_region:US-AK |display=title}} [[Category:1912 establishments in Alaska]] [[Category:Media in Juneau, Alaska]] [[Category:Morris Publishing Group]] [[Category:Newspapers published in Alaska]] [[Category:Publications established in 1912]] [[Category:Daily newspapers published in the United States]] {{Alaska-newspaper-stub}}
